org.spongepowered.api.data

Interface DataManipulatorRegistry


  • public interface DataManipulatorRegistry
    A registry of DataManipulators and their respective DataManipulatorBuilders. Registration should occur prior to GameState.SERVER_ABOUT_TO_START.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends DataManipulator<T>>
      Optional<DataManipulatorBuilder<T>>      		 getBuilder(Class<T> manipulatorClass)
      Attempts to retrieve the builder for the given DataManipulator.
      <T extends DataManipulator<T>>
      void      		 register(Class<T> manipulatorClass, DataManipulatorBuilder<T> builder)
      Registers the given DataManipulator class with it's associated DataManipulatorBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        <T extends DataManipulator<T>> void register(Class<T> manipulatorClass,
                                             DataManipulatorBuilder<T> builder)
        Registers the given DataManipulator class with it's associated DataManipulatorBuilder. The builder can be used to create new instances of the given DataManipulator for data retrieval, data representation, and mass application of a DataManipulator to multiple DataHolders.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of data manipulator
        Parameters:
        manipulatorClass - The class of the data manipulator
        builder - The builder instance of the data manipulator

      • getBuilder

        <T extends DataManipulator<T>> Optional<DataManipulatorBuilder<T>> getBuilder(Class<T> manipulatorClass)
        Attempts to retrieve the builder for the given DataManipulator.

        If the DataManipulator was not registered, multiple systems could fail to retrieve specific data.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of manipulator
        Parameters:
        manipulatorClass - The manipulator class
        Returns:
        The builder, if available
